name: CAH: Fourth Expansion
white_cards: A dance so face-meltingly hot, you have to go to the restroom and check your underwear.
A hot air balloon powered by fart gas.
A Kiwi with lasers for eyes
A map of Trump's electoral victory.
A sex doll that just wants to be friends.
All the ways the baby blogs convince you you are murdering your unborn child
Almost having sex in a dream.
Demanding an end to video game addiction
Depriving white men of the right to vote for 150 years and just seeing what happens.
Exploding so dead you're reincarnated into an abortion.
Fucking a girl so hard her nose bleeds.
How awesome it is to be white.
Jizzing in your Mother in-law's soup.
my dad's jar of petroleum jelly
my Yale College and my Harvard
Snorting coke off the back of a toilet
Some sort of unstoppable poo gun.
Stuffing my balls into a Sega Genesis and pressing the power button.
The best words. (And a below-average spell-checker.)
The pelican that will one day eat Scarlett Johansson's baby.
The safest way to have dolphin-sex.
The skin flute, in A minor.
The tiny man who lives inside the ATM and hands out all the money.
Three days without eating in the Arizona desert to reach the American Dream.
Unraveling 550 reels to look busy for a significant amount of time.
What looked like a chemical weapons facility but turned out to be a children's hospital.
Whispering to your chaplain that Jesus Christ was a pussy.

black_cards.text: _____ melts in your mouth, not in your hand.
_____ will win you the Mom of the Year award every time.
2 fish, 4 potato fritters, 1 scoop of chips and _____, crumbled if possible.
Affordable healthcare's not the answer.  Only _____ can end America's opioid epidemic.
Alright, bros. Our frat house is condemned, and all the hot slampieces are over at Gamma Phi. The time has come to commence Operation _____.
As long as my kid doesn't grow up to be _____, I'm happy.
Dammit, Gary.  You can't just solve every problem with _____.
Dear Mom and Dad, Camp is fun. I like capture the flag. Yesterday, one of the older kids taught me about _____. I love you, Casey
Do not go gentle into that good night. Rage, rage against _____?
Every Sunday "Insert Name" goes to market to sell _____, and every time comes home with Magic Beans.

Forget Fifty Shades of Grey...

Give me Fifty Shades of _____!
Honey, I have good news, and bad news.  The good news is that I'm _____.  The bad news is that I'm _____.
How am I going to kill myself?
I am become _____, the destroyer of worlds.
I'm pretty sure I'm high right now, because I'm absolutely mesmerized by _____.
I'm sorry, this table is reserved for _____.
If you can't love yourself, how the hell you gonna love _____?
In Rome, there are whisperings that the Vatican has a secret room devoted to _____.
In the category _____, the first prize is awarded to _____.
It makes me sad to think about?
Many questioned the Smithsonian's decision to feature an exhibit devoted to _____.
Other parents worry about _____ but I stress over _____.
She's a lady in the streets, _____ in the sheets.
The Juice is loose.  And by Juice I mean _____.

This is the way the world ends
This is the way the world ends
Not with a bang but with _____.

This year's trendiest card game:

"_____ Against _____."
We played baseball with _____.
Wes Anderson's new movie is a whimsical look at _____ starring _____.
What's going on with your female servicemembers?
You guys, you can buy _____ on the dark web.
Young lady, you better knock it off with _____ or you're grounded!
